YulStatement
     = 
    YulBlock
     | 
    YulVariableDeclaration
     | 
    YulFunctionDefinition
     | 
    YulAssignmentStatement
     | 
    YulFunctionCall
     | 
    YulIfStatement
     | 
    YulForStatement
     | 
    YulSwitchStatement
     | 
    YulLeaveStatement
     | 
    YulBreakStatement
     | 
    YulContinueStatement
     ;
